snippet: Works by European artists reacting to conflict in the Middle East are contrasted with works by Israeli and Palestinian artists in "Middle East Europe," a show at the Dox Centre for Contemporary Art in Prague through April 20.
abstract: Works by European artists reacting to conflict in the Middle East are contrasted with works by Israeli and Palestinian artists in "Middle East Europe," a show at the Dox Centre for Contemporary Art in Prague through April 20.

headline.main: In Prague, European, Palestinian and Israeli Views of the Middle East
